import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "../styles/About.css"; import avatar from "../img/image.png"; function About() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setIsVisible(true); }, []); const skills = [ { name: "React/JavaScript", percent: 90, icon: "‚öõÔ∏è", description: "Modern React development v·ªõi Hooks, Context API" }, { name: "HTML/CSS/SCSS", percent: 95, icon: "üé®", description: "Responsive design, CSS Grid, Flexbox, Animations" }, { name: "Node.js/Express", percent: 80, icon: "üöÄ", description: "Backend development, REST APIs, Database integration" }, { name: "UI/UX Design", percent: 85, icon: "‚ú®", description: "Figma, Adobe XD, User-centered design" }, { name: "Git/GitHub", percent: 88, icon: "üîß", description: "Version control, Collaboration, CI/CD workflows" }, { name: "MongoDB/SQL", percent: 75, icon: "üóÉÔ∏è", description: "Database design, Queries, Data modeling" } ];
